title: FREE BUTT (cartoonish Goudy Heavyface?)
content:
I'm sure everyone else wants a crack at this as well.   
   
 [![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/71029.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204055/http:/flickr.com/photos/adactio/11262476/)
author: quasistoic

comments.content:
Crack... hehe.   
   
Looks like something from the Caslon family that someone has stroked to within an inch of its life.
It's obviously the work of a skilled sign painter. The styles they use are not necessarilly available as fonts, even though they look like they could be.
If 'close' is good enough, [Stratford Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204055/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/stratford/ef-black/testdrive.html?s=FREE+BUTT&p=48) is pretty close.
Nice find, Mike. I figured there must be a face similar to this, but none came to mind.
